alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Nelson (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 2:29PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Grand Forks and east central Nelson Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 229 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Niagara, or 36 miles southwest of Grafton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Larimore, Petersburg, Niagara, McCanna and Logan Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
